content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. How much are you willing to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 1200 dollars per month. Can you accept this price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I am afraid that I cannot accept that price. I would need to consider other factors such as the location of the apartment, the quality of the amenities, and the length of the lease agreement before I can make a decision. May I ask if you have any other questions or concerns about the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: No, I understand. Thank you for your time. TERMINATE.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: No problem, Max. I understand that you are looking for a different rental price. If you have any other questions or concerns in the future, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. Thank you for your time and interest in the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
